description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ehkl9","text":"The Seahorse XFp Extracellular Flux Analyzer is designed to compare two different cultures or treatments. Culture cells as usual in either cell culture dishes or flasks as preferred. It is best to compare two cultures of a similar passage number, cell density, time that the cells have been in culture and time since the medium was changed as all this influences mitochondrial respiration. Culture cells until they are almost/just confluent. Cell should have been fed recently before use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

A large plastic box with a lid and a smaller plastic box without a lid. Put some tap water in the large box. Put the small box into the large box and close with the lid. Thaw out shortly before use in a water bath (vortex briefly when solution is thawed out). Freeze immediately after use because glutamine breaks down at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5jm5q","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b5fn7","text":"2-Deoxyglucose (2DG; Merck/Sigma, D8375-5G)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":43}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"53jeo","text":"Prepare a 500 mM 2-deoxyglucose solution by dissolving 82.1 mg of 2-deoxyglucose per 1 ml of Seahorse XF DMEM medium, pH 7.4, sterile in the laminar flow hood. Store in a plastic bijou at -20˚C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fsbka","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fksjv","text":"20 mM Hoechst 33342 (ThermoFisher)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b7h06","text":" Store at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"absqe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dt63o","text":"Oligomycin A (Merck/Sigma, 75351-5MG; toxic, use gloves; store powder at -20°C).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":38,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"42eh4","text":"Make a 10 mM oligomycin A stock in ethanol by adding 633 ml of ethanol to the vail. Vortex briefly to dissolve. Store stock at -20°C. Place on ice when the stock is used.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7eafc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9nqqi","text":"FCCP (carbonyl cyanide 4-​(trifluoromethoxy)​phenylhydrazone; Merck/Sigma, ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":60}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7u4h0","text":"C2920-10MG; toxic, use gloves; store powder at -20°C).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":11,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dhhvr","text":"Make a 40 mM FCCP stock in ethanol by adding 984 ml ethanol to the vail. Vortex briefly to dissolve. Dilute to 10 mM FCCP with ethanol: in a 1.5-ml screw-top tube add 750 ml ethanol and 250 ml 40 mM FCCP. Store both stocks at -20°C. Place on ice when the stock is used.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5c1ni","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cq9gq","text":"Antimycin A (Sigma, A8674-100MG; toxic, use gloves; store powder at -20°C).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":33,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"arper","text":"Make a 10 mM stock: weight out 5.4 mg of antimycin A in a 1.5-ml screw-top tube. Add 1 ml of ethanol. Vortex briefly to dissolve. Wrap tube in aluminium foil because antimycin A is light sensitive. Store stock at -20°C. Place on ice when the stock is used.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"au90g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f0up8","text":"Rotenone (Sigma, R8875-1G; toxic, use gloves; store powder at room temperature).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":27,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d7ban","text":"Make a 10 mM stock: weight out 4 mg of rotenone in a 1.5-ml screw-top tube. Add 1 ml of ethanol. Vortex extensively (for minutes) to dissolve. Make sure that the rotenone is fully dissolved. Wrap tube in aluminium foil because rotenone is light sensitive. Store stock at -20°C. Place on ice when the stock is used.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":104,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dgrgq","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cef08","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"97205DC7379311EE93150A58A9FEAC02","url":"http://www.agilent.com/en-us/products/cell-analysis-(seahorse)/software-download-for-seahorse-xfp-analyzer"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"97205DC7379311EE93150A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.agilent.com/en/product/cell-analysis/cell-imaging-microscopy/cell-imaging-multimode-readers/biotek-cytation-1-cell-imaging-multimode-reader-1623200"}}}}
